website_summaries.verdict: A clean whey isolate protein powder with no additives or artificial sweeteners.
pros: 25 grams of protein per serving of 120 calories
cons: The digestive enzymes may not be what every customer is looking for

customer_reviews.title: Best Tasting Protein Shake I ever had
customer_reviews.text: I am using the coffee latte flavor and mixing it up with Almond Milk. It tastes better than the Starbucks stuff. The best tasting Protein I've ever had by far.
customer_reviews.author: Kapil

customer_reviews.title: Clean and high quality Protein supplement
customer_reviews.text: Kaged Muscle makes some great products and this is another example. This protein supplement has 25 grams of protein per serving of pure whey protein isolate, the highest quality and most expensive whey protein there is. Did I also mention the chocolate flavor is absolutely amazing!!! The flavoring is all natural, contains no artificial flavors, and is free of artificial sweeteners! This product also contains ProHydroLase, an innovative patented digestive enzyme blend clinically shown to be more effective for maximizing protein digestion than whey protein on its own! Just shows this company is using an innovative ingredient to make its protein powder above the rest! Give it a try!
customer_reviews.author: Neal Mcallister

customer_reviews.title: Great taste, ignore the the trolls saying otherwise.
customer_reviews.text: For those writing a review about the “weed farts”... you obviously have issues that are not related to this product. This protein tastes good and I’ve not noticed any odd side effects. I’ve taken this product for a few days now and I like the taste. Can’t say too much about the effectiveness of the protein but it’s protein. Kinda hard to screw that up... So far I’m a fan. I plan to buy more in the future.
customer_reviews.author: BJ

customer_reviews.title: Clean amazing flavor protein.
customer_reviews.text: Clean protein, great taste, after trying it, I never buy any other one except this one. Vanilla flavour is so yummy. I tried chocolate as well was okay.
customer_reviews.author: Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Best Isolate I’ve ever taken
customer_reviews.text: The best protein I’ve ever had period. In terms of literally everything... Protein, natural chocolate taste, calories, even small detail like texture, no foaming when blended, easy digestion since it’s isolate obviously - so easy on my stomach, mixes easily with just 8-10oz water, can take any time of the day. This is awesomeness
customer_reviews.author: Naga Sai Bharadwaj Vadlamannati

customer_reviews.title: No thank you.
customer_reviews.text: I cannot use this. The after taste and the taste similar to artificial sweetener does not appeal to me. Some may not find this so, but I would not recommend this product. If I could return it I would. 😕
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Great for muscle building
customer_reviews.text: This product, I believe, is one of the best for muscle building. The addition of ProHydrolase gives this product an advantage over others. ProHydrolase helps break down the protein and get it into the muscles faster when it can do the most good. On the negative side the flavor Cinnamon Roll is awful. I have also tried the vanilla which I found to be way better than the Cinnamon Roll.
customer_reviews.author: S.J.

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY DIE FROM YOUR FARTS
customer_reviews.text: Taste good but makes you fart it smells like weed and I don’t smoke anything. Made me go to the bathroom 6times during 45min workout. This happens every time I use this trash.
customer_reviews.author: No name

customer_reviews.title: Tastes really good, has no unnecessary additives. Love it.
customer_reviews.text: I would say this is working really well. I'm at the gym every day and I use this protein twice a day. I'm in the best shape of my life, I'm sure this protein isolate has SOMETHING to do with it. On top of that, its sweetened with stevia and the ingredients list is super short. I'm a big fan. I suggest this Kaged Muscle isolate to anyone who asks! The brand name is kinda silly though, in all honesty. makes me embarrassed to tell people at first haha.
customer_reviews.author: Corey Howell

customer_reviews.title: Hands down best tasting whey protein Isolate!
customer_reviews.text: I love Chocolate and Kaged Muscles Whey Protein Isolate Satisfies my craving for Chocolate daily! The protein mixes with water or milk with zero effort! It’s tastes amazing and doesn’t have any artificial flavors or colors! It’s also third party tested for purity and heavy metal contamination! What’s not to love?
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Nicholas

customer_reviews.title: i get to eat dessert every day
customer_reviews.text: as with all protein powder, it's really hard to tell if this stuff is better than other brands like gold standard. despite the higher price per lb than other brands this is whey tastier :) the chocolate tastes a lot more like cocoa (not necessarily sweeter) and i feel like im sipping on a chocolate milkshake all day
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Cinnamon Roll is cheaper for a reason...
customer_reviews.text: To be fair, this is an excellent product in terms of ingredients, ease of digestion, hunger curbing, etc. The only reason I’m rating this at 3/5 stars is because cinnamon roll DOES NOT taste good at all. If you’re interested in buying this product, steer clear from cinnamon roll! If you have already purchased cinnamon roll or wish to purchase it anyways to save the money, mixing with water is much better tasting than with milk (I’ve tried 2%, almond, oat, and lactaid). Use water!!!
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing. It tastes awesome, it is gentle on my stomach (lactose sensitivity) and safe for me to take while pregnant because Kage Muscle doesn’t add anything extra.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Sellers

customer_reviews.title: Protein shake
customer_reviews.text: I love the chocolate and adding skim milk and a banana makes for a very tasty shake. I feel better and have a lot more energy.
customer_reviews.author: Annie Oakley

customer_reviews.title: Fab!
customer_reviews.text: I love this ! I have uses many powders and this is my fAvorite. Good flavor, low calories and high protein. I wish they would create. Vegan option!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Smidge

customer_reviews.title: Don't get coffee flavor....
customer_reviews.text: This doesn't keep me full for as long as I'd like, and I don't like the coffee flavor and after taste very much.
customer_reviews.author: Natasha Avila

customer_reviews.title: Tastes Off
customer_reviews.text: Not sure what happened to the flavor. I have been drinking the chocolate flavor for over a year now and loved it. This last container I got tastes disgusting. The consistency is thicker when adding the same amount of milk as before. It used to remind me of chocolate me and now I have to force myself to drink it. Might have to go to a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent C

customer_reviews.title: Mixes TERRIBLY!!
customer_reviews.text: When adding to a blender, this stuff mixes up SO FOAMY!! U either have to wait almost 30 minutes for the foam to go away of drink the foam. Kaged Muscle use to be my go to for all workout supplements. Lately I've noticed their products have become crappy. Im officially done with this company.
customer_reviews.author: Maurice

customer_reviews.title: Good ingredients
customer_reviews.text: Maybe there is no perfect protein powder, but this one is at least free of gums and soy. Taste is acceptable, and mixes easily with water.
customer_reviews.author: Brendan K

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: Good stuff. Love that there's not a bunch of bad tor you ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: Danie

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff
customer_reviews.text: Just a fantastic protein. Taste is great even in water.
customer_reviews.author: Kaleb

customer_reviews.title: Tastes great. I add it to my coffee every morning
customer_reviews.text: Tastes great. I add it to my coffee every morning!
customer_reviews.author: Playitcool

customer_reviews.title: Flavor
customer_reviews.text: Tastes like coffee, who would have guessed. I mix mine with milk and I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Kteague92

customer_reviews.title: 👍🏼👍🏼
customer_reviews.text: Great taste. Not overly sugar like some proteins. Would like to know what the micropure metal content is, due to processing.
customer_reviews.author: A•Ray

customer_reviews.title: Top Notch Protein!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Nothing but the best mixes easily in water and no stomach upset at all.
customer_reviews.author: jason

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: If u r trying to gain lean muscle perfect protein for u.
customer_reviews.author: goktug hoser

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't mix that well, but a good product. I'll order again
customer_reviews.author: john frederick

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: Not a fan of the flavor.doesn't make me think of a cinnamon roll
customer_reviews.author: J Harms

customer_reviews.title: Great product excellent flavor!
customer_reviews.text: Fiancee drinks 3 a day! Loves the flavor and mixes well with milk!
customer_reviews.author: Norman Udstad III

customer_reviews.title: Really like this product
customer_reviews.text: My husband likes this product a lot. This is the3rd time he has ordered Kaged Muscle. It tastes good easy to drink.
customer_reviews.author: J M Wise

customer_reviews.title: Wrong information
customer_reviews.text: The nutrition facts picture shows 45 servings but I only have 39. Also, there is added carbs and sugars.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love Kaged Muscle
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff! Kaged Muscle is awesome! I use it in my coffee every a.m and for a snack when I need just a little more protein to kill the hunger. By far my favorite brand!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Flavor and quality
customer_reviews.text: Amazing flavor, especially if your looking for something that has a little sweetener while dieting. Mixes very well, and no after taste.
customer_reviews.author: Kc Jabs

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Tastes amazing. Clean ingredients. I mix with ice almond milk and a banana and it tastes good. Excellent boost of protein.
customer_reviews.author: Oksanna Miller

customer_reviews.title: Best Whey Protein
customer_reviews.text: I love the purity of this whey! Others that I’ve taken give me a lot of unwanted side affects but not Kage Muscles MicroPure. It’s clean and pure!!
customer_reviews.author: scott greise

customer_reviews.title: Works Very Well!!
customer_reviews.text: I really love this stuff helps me power through my work outs with out any lingering side effects.
customer_reviews.author: Julio Sarmiento

customer_reviews.title: My go to Protein
customer_reviews.text: This is my go to protein; the taste is great and causes no bloat! Vanilla is my go to flavor, but I am excited to try the new flavors. This protein mixes very well in just a shaker cup.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You won’t even know your drinking protein, so good!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best protein I’ve ever had! Dissolves quickly so you don’t have that grainy texture and takes like chocolate cake batter. Definitely high quality.
customer_reviews.author: marie

customer_reviews.title: Best i've ever had!
customer_reviews.text: Been a personal trainer for about 10 years and this is not only one of the healthiest but also by far the best tasting protein i've ever had. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Corey Leavens

customer_reviews.title: Great protein!
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent product recommended to me by my trainer. It tastes good, especially vanilla, and mixes well. It has a nice light texture.
customer_reviews.author: Chris R

customer_reviews.title: Clean ingredients gmo free
customer_reviews.text: Kaged Muscle is The best brand out there, best ingredients and it’s Been tests by the owner Mr Kris.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Great Whey Isolate
customer_reviews.text: One of the best I have had so far! Value for money, easy to digest and fantastic taste
customer_reviews.author: Chintan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Meets the after workout protein needs of my body.
customer_reviews.author: ArkansasDevon

customer_reviews.title: Tastes great
customer_reviews.text: This taste awesome, bakes up well, and doesn’t cause bloat. Would highly recommmend.
customer_reviews.author: Garren

customer_reviews.title: Taste
customer_reviews.text: Best tasting protein I've tried yet. Will be ordering again (coffee latte)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Delishous protein
customer_reviews.text: Very smooth and rich tasting. Mixes well with water or milk ( I use almond) no upset stomach
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!  Great Taste!
customer_reviews.text: Really great taste. Easy to dissolve. Love mix with Almond milk!
customer_reviews.author: Adam E

customer_reviews.title: Good whey islolate
customer_reviews.text: Always been a fan of Kaged products. Wanted try this new whey isolate. Mixes pretty good. But I felt like it’s little too sweet. But over all pretty good
customer_reviews.author: Keerthi

customer_reviews.title: High-quality, great tasting protein
customer_reviews.text: Kaged Muscle simply does supplements right, and their Micropure Whey Isolate is the newest example. I was very happy when this came out as I was only using Re-Kaged and didn't enjoy taking other protein powders. Re-Kaged is best for post-workout recovery whereas this can be used anytime. I've only tried the chocolate flavor, but it's literally the best tasting chocolate protein I've ever had. Great consistency, 25g protein, BCAAs and EAAs, and ProHydrolase enzyme to speed up digestion. Very high-quality product with the same full label disclosure and Micropure 3rd-party testing that Kaged Muscle is known for. I refuse to buy supplements until someone can do it as well as Kris and his team do.
customer_reviews.author: Tariq R.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Let me start off by saying I have been using Pre-Kaged since 2015 and have been a fan of all Kaged Muscle supplements ever since. I am a Mens Physique competitor and for my prep I need an ISOLATE protein. For my first show this past March, I used ISO 100 by Dymatize. Ever since KM came out with their own Isolate I will never look back. Easy on the stomach, mixes easy and the taste is AMAZING. I purchased both Vanilla and Chocolate, both phenomenal. I have been using this protein to prep for my national show later this month. Hands down the best quality, great amount of EAAs and the best bang for the buck. HIGHLY RECOMMEND!
customer_reviews.author: Stan

customer_reviews.title: Ingredients changed flavor not good
customer_reviews.text: I've been using the chocolate flavor for well over a year. Tastes great, mixes great. The last order I received August 2020 the flavor has a noticeable difference. My wife noticed the same thing. It has a noticeable chemical taste to it now. I checked the ingredients and sure enough it had changed. I love Kaged Muscle products but for me the flavor is not good any more.
customer_reviews.author: Dean08

customer_reviews.title: Kaged muscle micropure whey protein.
customer_reviews.text: I just received my micropure whey protein. And most tell you it's another great product by Kris Gethin. The taste is great and it dissolve fast. It has 25g of protein, 5.5g od total BCAA and 11.7g of EAA. Leaving it with 1g of sugar and a tone of healthy properties. I mix it with my hydracharge the taste is awesome. Looking forward to these massive monster gains.
customer_reviews.author: MELLOSMOOTHE

customer_reviews.title: Best Value!!
customer_reviews.text: This protein was definitely better than I expected. I love the other version Kaged Muscle has but this is by far the best value. 42 servings per container compared to 20-30 servings. At $50 or less per container it is the best deal. Taste is good and easy to swig.
customer_reviews.author: Dakota Moorefield

customer_reviews.title: Love It
customer_reviews.text: Flavor and quality are top-of-the-line. Have not had a bad product from this brand yet. Chocolate and vanilla are best to me, and cinnamon is good for occasional use/special treat. Blends in ice coffee superbly! Price seemed high at first, but it is 3 pounds. Great job KM, please keep up the great work!
customer_reviews.author: minnzo

customer_reviews.title: Not Sure if this is for me
customer_reviews.text: The Cinnamon Roll flavor is what I ordered and it was terrible tasting. If you like vanilla you will probably like this but it has a hint of cinnamon in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Going Rogue

customer_reviews.title: Fast absorbing
customer_reviews.text: Best protein ive tried in a while. Reminds of the original ON formula before they took out the aminogen.
customer_reviews.author: Bearded dreamer

customer_reviews.title: Cinnamon wasn't as cinnamon should taste
customer_reviews.text: I won't purchase this again didn't taste that great . Kaged products don't taste as good as other supplement companies
customer_reviews.author: oldermuscleguy

customer_reviews.title: So sweet
customer_reviews.text: It was so unbearably sweet. It was the sweetest protein powder I’ve ever tried. I don’t know if I’ll be able to finish it. Really disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Tiff

customer_reviews.title: Love it- buying one in chocolate for late day mixes to go along with the caffeine am kick
customer_reviews.text: Love it love it love it.. love the taste and benefits I’ve send in drinking this daily.
customer_reviews.author: D Palmer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy cinnamon roll
customer_reviews.text: Cinnamon roll is the worst tasting protein I have ever had. Taste like crap and leaves a nasty foam on top of the shaker bottle when you shake it up
customer_reviews.author: Alex Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Kaged Muscle is know for the quality and the purity of their products. This is by far one of the best protein powders on the market. The natural flavors might take some getting used to but this is a 10/10
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Good protein
customer_reviews.text: I mix with peanut butter powder and almond milk to improve taste
customer_reviews.author: jb

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Taste good. Taste kinda sweet, but thats fine by me. Didn't upset my stomach. Surprised the tub was as full as it was. That's a plus. I threw in some pics for those that like that kinda thing.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Superior quality
customer_reviews.text: Great ingredients and company. The vanilla could be a little more pronounced.
customer_reviews.author: fiderlick

customer_reviews.title: best flavor
customer_reviews.text: i've tried the chocolate and vanilla flavors and this is hands down the best one so far...has the best coffee flavor!
customer_reviews.author: 219indiana

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: A good taste and doesn’t taste too chalky. Great in smoothies or just by itself with water
customer_reviews.author: Erin Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Mixes great taste great
customer_reviews.text: Really liking this protein powder. Great taste. No problems mixing into my morning shake without a mixing ball.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin Jones

product_meta.title: Kaged Muscle Whey Protein Powder, 100% Whey Protein Isolate for Post Workout Recovery, Vanilla, 3lbs
product_meta.description: Flavor:VanillaMICROPURE Whey Protein Isolate is a clean, premium whey isolate protein powder made for lifters and athletes of all disciplines. Whether you’re looking to build more muscle, support post-workout recovery, or just tired of low-quality protein formulas pumped full of artificial colors and sweeteners, you owe it to yourself to see why MICROPURE WPI is one of the highest-rated protein supplements available. Every serving delivers a complete profile of essential amino acids and branched chain amino acids, which flood your muscles with the nutrients scientifically proven to help you make real gains size, strength and post-workout recovery. But, what really makes our protein a nutritional powerhouse? ProHydrolase. This patented digestive enzyme blend breaks down (hydrolyzes) whey protein into smaller particles for enhanced digestion and absorption, which happens in real time as soon as it’s introduced to water or milk. The result is a premium, fast-acting whey protein isolate that triggers the muscle and strength-building process almost instantly. Made in a world-class, FDA-registered facility, our whey protein isolate powder is filtered using advanced cross-flow micro- and ultrafiltration technology to minimize fat, cholesterol, lactose and other impurities, for an ultrapure isolate protein. The result is a rich, creamy protein shake powder that is both clean and great-tasting. It’s like treating yourself to a delicious milkshake after every workout. Whether you’re a lifter, a fighter, an athlete, or just want a clean and delicious way to fuel your muscles, it’s time you experienced the Kaged Muscle difference. Our performance-first supplements not only work to deliver real results in the gym, and on the field, but provide incredible value for your money. If you’re serious about building muscle and strength, and tired of poor quality protein that’s pumped full of artificial colors, sweeteners, and proprietary protein blends, try MICROPURE Whey Protein Isolate.
feature_bullets: BUILD MORE MUSCLE: Whey Protein Isolate powder delivers 25g of whey protein per serving. With full-spectrum BCAAs and EAAs, this fast-acting protein shake saturates muscles with nutrients scientifically shown to help build rock-hard muscle.*

FORMULATED FOR ENHANCED ABSORPTION: Our advanced whey isolate protein powder utilizes ProHydrolase, a premium enzyme blend that enhances protein digestion, absorption and utilization, helping you get more out of every, single scoop.*

GOLD-STANDARD PROTEIN PURITY & QUALITY: Every batch is cold-processed, then purified using ultrafiltration technology to reduce fat, cholesterol and impurities. The result is a smooth, pure isolate protein that always mixes up rich and creamy.

TASTES LIKE A REAL MILKSHAKE: We use natural flavors to achieve a luscious milkshake taste, with no dyes, or artificial flavoring. The protein source is 100% whey protein isolate, with no amino spiking, protein blends, or concentrates.

THE KAGED MUSCLE DIFFERENCE: Made with some of the most premium and patented ingredients available, Kaged Muscle supplements are formulated for performance-minded men and women who not only want results, but also want clean, quality products.
